export.intro: Thank you for submitting your export inquiry to TransChamber. We have received your request and our team will review it shortly.
next_steps: Our team will review your export requirements
We'll contact you within 2-3 business days
We'll provide guidance on export procedures and requirements
We'll connect you with relevant trade partners if needed
export.about_intro: TransChamber is dedicated to promoting international trade and business opportunities. We provide:
export.closing: We appreciate your interest in international trade and look forward to assisting you with your export requirements.
export.signature:
Best regards,
TransChamber Team
Trade Association Chamber of Commerce International

complaints.intro: Thank you for bringing your concern to our attention. We have received your complaint and our team will review it shortly.
next_steps: Our team will review your complaint thoroughly
We'll contact you within 2-3 business days
We'll investigate the matter and take appropriate action
We'll provide you with a resolution and follow-up
